about.bio: I am an Electrical Engineering undergraduate from The Hong Kong Polytechnic University, specializing in power systems and automation. I have experience designing energy-efficient electrical networks using AutoCAD and DIALux, building Raspberry Pi sensor control systems, and improving data-processing workflows with MATLAB/Python. I enjoy turning real constraints (safety, reliability, efficiency) into clear engineering solutions, and I’m aiming for roles in power electronics or smart grid technologies.
highlights: Designed lighting & power distribution networks with AutoCAD + DIALux, improving energy efficiency by ~15%
Built Raspberry Pi multi-sensor control systems with ~95% operational reliability/accuracy
Optimized MATLAB/Python workflows to reduce computation time by ~30%
Hands-on lab experience with wiring systems and low-voltage switchboards (100% safety compliance)

works.title: Electrical System Design (AutoCAD + DIALux)
works.shortDesc: Designed lighting and power distribution networks for commercial floor plans; optimized energy efficiency by ~15%.
works.longDesc: Created lighting and power distribution layouts using AutoCAD and DIALux, focusing on practical constraints and efficiency targets. Iterated design choices to improve energy efficiency by approximately 15% while maintaining realistic deployment considerations.

works.title: Raspberry Pi Multi-Sensor Control System
works.shortDesc: Built a Raspberry Pi system with temperature/motion sensors to automate outputs with ~95% accuracy.
works.longDesc: Programmed a Raspberry Pi-based control system integrating multiple sensors (temperature, motion). Implemented automation logic for output responses and validated performance to reach around 95% operational accuracy/reliability in testing.

works.title: Sensor Data Processing & Predictive Modeling (MATLAB/Python)
works.shortDesc: Processed sensor data and built predictive models; reduced computation time by ~30%.
works.longDesc: Built data-processing workflows for sensor datasets and generated predictive models using MATLAB. Optimized the pipeline (including Python where applicable) to reduce computation time by approximately 30%, improving iteration speed for analysis.

works.title: Low Voltage Wiring System & LV Switchboard Lab Build
works.shortDesc: Built and tested a complete wiring system and LV switchboard; achieved 100% safety compliance in lab assessment.
works.longDesc: Hands-on build and test of wiring systems and a low-voltage switchboard under lab standards. Focused on correct wiring practices, safety checks, and validation procedures to meet full compliance requirements.

works.title: 3D Modeling & Prototyping (SolidWorks)
works.shortDesc: Developed functional 3D models of electrical components; included stress analysis for manufacturability.
works.longDesc: Created 3D models of electrical components using SolidWorks and performed stress analysis to support manufacturability considerations. Produced models suitable for prototyping discussions and engineering documentation.
